response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would serve you equally well. Given its unique features and potential benefits, I estimate its worth to be significantly higher than what you might find elsewhere. Considering its true value, I am offering it to you for $950,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic qualities but also the opportunity to secure such a high-quality item at a premium yet reasonable cost. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
